messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] looking for friends in Destin Florida
messages.msgSnippet: I live in Panama City.  Contact me off list and we can see if we want to meet up.  Destin is about an hour or so from here.  I can get on the base, which has
messages.messageBody:
I live in Panama City. Contact me off list and we can see if we want
to meet up. Destin is about an hour or so from here. I can get on
the base, which has an uncrowded and unspoiled beach. We also have a
pool at our house. My kids are John B-Day 15 Oct (he'll be 13) Liam
B-Day 9 Sept (he'll be 11) and Morgan B-Day 20 Aug (she'll be 5)
Karen
"I argue that the Talmud is about the constant struggle to understand."
~Arthur Hertzberg



On Sun, Jul 12, 2009 at 1:48 PM, Geneva<gozas@...> wrote:
>
>
> Hey unschoolers!
>
> My family will be making a trip to Destin after labor day. This is a first
> for us, we will be there for a week with our 3 little ones (8, 6 and 3).
>
> We are hoping to find some unschoolers there to meet with on the beach and
> correspond with before we get there.
>
> I would LOVE a chance to swap kids with another family so that dh and I can
> have some alone time and maybe help out another unschooling couple who could
> use some downtime. That of course is just a bonus - we would be more than
> happy to just have lunch with another family and let the kids play a bit.
>
> We found a condo for less than $400 for 7 days (!!! Wow!!).
>
> If a family from another area would like to meet us in Destin that would
> work too! I am happy to share any info that we have. We will be driving
> from Dallas - so this should be a pretty inexpensive vacation!
>
> Feel free to pass my email along!
>
> Geneva
>
> [Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
>
>

messages.subject: looking for friends in Destin Florida
messages.msgSnippet: Hey unschoolers! My family will be making a trip to Destin after labor day.  This is a first for us, we will be there for a week with our 3 little ones (8, 6
messages.messageBody:
Hey unschoolers!



My family will be making a trip to Destin after labor day. This is a first
for us, we will be there for a week with our 3 little ones (8, 6 and 3).

We are hoping to find some unschoolers there to meet with on the beach and
correspond with before we get there.

I would LOVE a chance to swap kids with another family so that dh and I can
have some alone time and maybe help out another unschooling couple who could
use some downtime. That of course is just a bonus - we would be more than
happy to just have lunch with another family and let the kids play a bit.



We found a condo for less than $400 for 7 days (!!! Wow!!).



If a family from another area would like to meet us in Destin that would
work too! I am happy to share any info that we have. We will be driving
from Dallas - so this should be a pretty inexpensive vacation!

Feel free to pass my email along!



Geneva



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
